page.title: 18LINDFIELD HIGH STREER
page.content: LINDFIELD HIGH STREET THE HIGH STREET IS VERY MUCH THE CENTRE OF VILLAGE LIFE:SOME OF THE HOUSES AND SHOPS DATE BACK OVER FIVE HUNDRED YEARS.EVEN THE OLD TOLL HOUSE IS USED AS A SHOP.THE STREET IS LINED WITH LINDEN (LIME) TREES THAT GIVE THE VILLAGE ITS NAME.THERE ARE A WIDE VARIETY OF SHOPS FROM MUSIC AND ANTIQUES TO THOSE PROVIDING FOR DAILY REQUIREMENTS-BUTCHER,GROCER,BAKER, GREENGROCER AND NEWSAGENTS. PROFESSIONAL SERVICES ARE OFFERED BY TWO BANKS, A POST OFFICE,A SOLICITOR, TWO ESTATE AGENTS AND A MEDICAL CENTRE WITH FOUR DOCTORS AND TWO DENTISTS. FOUR INNS, A RESTURANT AND TWO CHURCHES PROVIDE FOR DIFFERING NEEDS OF THE POPULATION.FIVE BUSES SERVICES LINK LINDFIELD WITH LOCAL VILLAGES AND TOWNS AS WELL AS LONGER DISTANCE RUNS TO LONDON.
